Text: Re ETS STAFF MEETING Jan Cc fine

SDGE Asks FERC to cap capacity release ratesForwarded by Michael MoranGPGFINEnron on PM Mary CT PM To Christopher F CT Tim CT Greg CT Mike CT Matt CT Tom CT Mark CT Robert CT Shelley CormanET NRON Phillip K CT Michael MoranET NRON Dave Parquet Jake Thomas Jeff CT Sean CT Diana CT John M CT Richard Sanders cc Subject SDGE Asks FERC to cap capacity release rates Bill Chen on PM To cc Subject Dec SDGE Press Release CRECers Note attached SDGE press release calling on Governor Davis to use his emergency powers to remedy the accelerating energy crisis by taking a number of actions eg directing local air districts to temporarily lift emissions limits for instate power plants so that the plants which have met or exceeded their airemissions limits can run In addition SDGE reported it made an emergency filing with FERC requesting an immediate reinstatement of price caps on interstate natural gas pipeline transportation to the CA border Bill Sempra PRdoc

PRCdate I have only received suggested reviewers for Dorothy You need to submit thru the system suggested reviewers if you wish to go thru the PRC process which I might add is mandatory if you wish to be considered for a bonus

Cleaned up Capacity System LOIAfter you review we can discuss Forwarded by Michael MoranGPGFINEnron on PM Julia White PM To Stanley nron Steve NRON Shelley CormanET NRON Danny McCartyET nron Michael MoranET NRON cc Subject Cleaned up Capacity System LOI This is the latest draft from Julie for your review I realize we will discuss at the staff meeting on Monday Thanks Julia Forwarded by Julia WhiteETSEnron on PM From Julie A Gomez ECT PM To Julia WhiteET NRON cc Subject Cleaned up Capacity System LOI Dear Julia Here is the cleaned up version of what I sent you the other day Please let me know your comments ASAP Thanks Julie

Re Unit billing for yearend Cc it is important to get estimates from the litigation group and from outside counsel on major matters I am not going to lose any sleep if we dont get something on the GrynbergQuinque cases from outside counsel because frankly there has not been a lot of activity and our fractional share of joint bills for matters would be relatively small

SDGE Asks FERC to cap capacity release ratesForwarded by Michael MoranGPGFINEnron on PM Mary CT PM To Christopher F CT Tim CT Greg CT Mike CT Matt CT Tom CT Mark CT Robert CT Shelley CormanET NRON Phillip K CT Michael MoranET NRON Dave Parquet Jake Thomas Jeff CT Sean CT Diana CT John M CT Richard Sanders cc Subject SDGE Asks FERC to cap capacity release rates Bill Chen on PM To cc Subject Dec SDGE Press Release CRECers Note attached SDGE press release calling on Governor Davis to use his emergency powers to remedy the accelerating energy crisis by taking a number of actions eg directing local air districts to temporarily lift emissions limits for instate power plants so that the plants which have met or exceeded their airemissions limits can run In addition SDGE reported it made an emergency filing with FERC requesting an immediate reinstatement of price caps on interstate natural gas pipeline transportation to the CA border Bill Sempra PRdoc
Re ETS STAFF MEETING Jan Cc fine

Goals and Objectiveshere is my input on the Goals and Objectives My numbering will correspond to the list of goals and objectives which accompanied your email Completed Final certificate was gotten in Feb and the west leg construction was completed and in service around Partially completed PD received on Phase on but the EIS is not expected til No input No input Completed As you know CitrusNet was not completed We have developed a good structure for the transaction being considered a sale and we have developed the necessary contract documents to accomplish the deal but at present we have no takers No comments I think this was intended to be the MOPS sale which I believe has been moved to next year No comment Efforts were made with a couple of potential buyers to work out a deal but nothing definitive was accomplished A lot of work was done in connection with Project Cristobal but nothing was finalized with potential partners No comment

Re EnronOnline Credit Derivatives Propsoed Reference Entitieshave talked with some of the commercial folks in the Gas Pipeline Group and in addition to ElPaso Energywhich I have previously discussed with you we believe that Wisconsin Gas Company and Wisconsin Electric Power Company should be on the restricted entity listPlease call if you have any questions
